QuestData.Title: Prisoner of the Bladespire
QuestData.Description: Shortly after my arrival in the mountains, I came under attack by a group of Bladespire ogres.$b$bThough I fought free of them, and slew many, they took my wyvern, Leokk, captive. Spirit has found him, locked in a cage in the heart of the Bladespire encampment outside of Gruul's lair.$b$bOne of the ogres must carry his key. Find it and Spirit can use it to unlock Leokk's cage.$B$BYou will find the encampment at the north end of the Daggermaw Canyon down below.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay Bladespire ogres to get the Wyvern Cage Key. Once you have it, go to the Wyvern Cage and use Spirit's Whistle to summon Spirit, who will unlock the cage to free Leokk.
QuestData.CompletionText: It will be good to have Leokk's aid once again.
QuestData.RewardText: Leokk has brought to us the head from one of the black dragons at Dragon's End. With this, we will be able to infuriate Goc, the gronn that captured him, and lure him into battle.
